short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate commissions for your Xero invoices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds extra columns to your Invoices page on Xero for calculating commissions. Just enter the commission percentage for an invoice and the commission amount will be calculated accordingly. It also calculates the total commission amount for all visible invoices. Filter your invoices to see the commission total specific to that subset of invoices.
